author: markekraus
body:
* Adds the /Get/ functionality to Weblistener
* Replaces the tests that rely on httpbin.org/get with WebListener

Some tests which use a loop still call httpbin.org. those will be moved when the other functions they rely on have been added. Also, A few of the tests has disabled `should`'s that can now be enabled.

reference #2504

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
@markekraus,
Thanks for having already signed the Contribution License Agreement. Your agreement was validated by Microsoft. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @markekraus Sorry for my inconsiderateness today. Thanks for the great work!

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @iSazonov  No problem! I was making a lot of tiny changes in a huge context. I got lost a few times making these changes. I suspected it might make for a tough review.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It seems WebListener.psm1 is stable now and follow PRs will be small. 😄

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @iSazonov It actually will change again. I plan on adding a `Query` parameter to build the query string from a dictionary for the tests that require it. I have held off until it is needed. I'm using it in my own project [here](https://github.com/markekraus/PSRAW/blob/IterativeWork/Tests/tools/Modules/WebListener/WebListener.psm1#L93). After that, though, it will just be a matter of adding additional tests to the `ValidateSet`.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @markekraus The test is now pending - so please rebase to pass CI.

title: Replace httpbin.org/get tests With WebListener
